about_the_game:
Your mission is to be part of a skillful group of mercenary geese tasked with vanquishing dark forces to proclaim a new era of justice.
But the task will be impossible alone, join up with other geese to make your party complete.
The party will always need three combat ready geese.

Meet the Warrior


"With wings spread wide, I take my place at the frontline and the honor is all mine!" - The Warrior

Meet the Cleric


"Honk softly, dear, I shall mend your wounds with love." - The Cleric

Meet the Archer


"Arrows made out of my own feathers always hit the target." - The Archer

Features

● Online co-op, you won't survive alone!
● Random matchmaking, no friends, no problem!
● Class selection, start with the basic classes and unlock many more.
● Journey selection, choose the adventure you embark on.
● Party leveling up, democratically pick an upgrade that will serve the group best.
● Account progression, anything you do during the journey will be rewarded.
● Daily missions, the job never ends.
● Customization, unlock skins & more.

Who & why?

Hey, hi, I'm Mads, I'm fascinated with silly ideas such as this one.
I've made a bunch of games in the past, you can check out my stuff at mads.games.
I love playing games with my pals and actually I'm making this game with some friends, so the only logical step was to create a multiplayer goose game.
My hope is that I'll make this game and a bunch of friends around the world can play, laugh and create some fun memories.

And if you don't like geese I completely understand, they can be really sassy sometimes.

name: Honk of Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 2.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1650 Ti
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Join your gaggle of fearless friends and honk your way into adventure. Whether you're tanking as a stubborn goose or healing your flock with compassionate honks, every role counts in this coop dungeon crawler!
